channel.title: 718+ Client Connection Issues
channel.description:
Hello all.
First of all, I recently downloaded Fox2007's 718/753 Server but without the source. Many people, including me have been getting issues with connecting the client to that 718/753. Fox said that any 718+ client originally from Matrix can work.
Fox also said that all I needed to do is to change the SUB_REVISION in the Loader.java in my client to SUB_REVISION = 1, the client revision should be at 1, and the port should be at 43595.
As I did that, I still get a Js5 error and I already tried 4 clients out. When I use other RSPS sources, the 718+ Clients usually work. Any help please?
Here is a picture that I captured with the error: [IMG]http://oi40.tinypic.com/11i1kwy.jpg[/img]

item.title: 718+ Client Connection Issues
item.dc:creator: @Kon Kon
item.description:
@Kon wrote:

Got the same problem

Read full topic
